backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling profiles, posts, comments, reactions, and moderation with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing added Facts page, routing, and navigation updates across frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of numerous frontend source files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color tokens, themes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup using TanStack Router with lazy-loaded pages including new Facts route.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuthorName: Displays a username for a principal or a shortened fallback when loading or missing.
frontend/src/components/admin/FlaggedPos: Admin panel listing flagged posts with filtering, sorting, and flag-clearing actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedCo: Admin panel listing reported comments with actions to clear reports or delete comments and handling loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedPo: Admin interface for viewing reported posts, allowing clearing reports or deleting posts with full UI state handling.
frontend/src/components/age/AgeAcknowled: Age gate wrapper that blocks access to adult routes until the user confirms they are 18+.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity, query cache clearing, and age-gate reset.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Renders an individual comment with reporting, reactions, errors, and basic author/timestamp display.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, profile and age gates, and global structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Mobile navigation drawer showing links based on authentication and admin status with a close-able sheet UI.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Moder: Re-usable moderation alert component displaying a warning message with consistent styling.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders a post card with author info, media, reactions, reporting, deleting, and navigation to comments using various backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Shows a mandatory profile setup dialog for new authenticated users, allowing username, bio, and age confirmation before continuing.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Displays reaction buttons with icons and handles selection, pending states, and click callbacks.
frontend/src/components/state/QueryState: Provides UI components for loading skeletons, error messages, empty states, and background refresh indicators.
frontend/src/components/state/RouteChunk: Shows a centered spinner and message while route-based chunks are loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendExternalBlo: Generates a safe URL for external video blobs using direct URLs or object URLs with cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendImageUrl.ts: Converts image blobs to direct or object URLs and handles URL cleanup on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current user identity state and their fetched profile information.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as posts, profiles, usernames, and admin status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout, and moderation alert styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with access checks and tabs for reviewing reported and flagged content.
frontend/src/pages/FactsPage.tsx: Displays a long list of urine-related facts inside a simple card layout.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Implements the main feed with post creation, media uploads, moderation handling, and real-time post refreshing.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the landing page with branding, guidelines, and calls to action for joining or accessing the feed.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with its comments, handles loading/error states, and allows authenticated users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the current user's profile, managing form state, validation, and save operations with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/TipsPage.tsx: Renders hydration tips and urine-related facts as static lists within styled cards.
frontend/src/utils/ageGate.ts: Manages age‑gate acknowledgement via localStorage and determines which routes require age confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/flaggedPostsView.ts: Provides helpers for analyzing flagged posts, including flag reason extraction, media checks, and timestamp sorting.
frontend/src/utils/moderation.ts: Normalizes backend moderation errors, detects moderation blocks, and categorizes error messages.
frontend/src/utils/postImages.ts: Validates image uploads, converts images to backend blobs, generates preview URLs, and extracts backend error messages.
frontend/src/utils/postVideos.ts: Validates video uploads, converts videos to backend blobs, and handles preview URL creation and cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL and hash parameters and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities for clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and known issues for the app’s build state.
